name: Blackwater Park
description:
You've just entered Blackwater Park where the dead do not stay dead.  Enjoy this top-down shooter roguelike where every run offers new upgrades in your quest for survival.  Collect coins to advance rounds.  Survive for 10 rounds and be free of this accursed place.

Controls

  • Movement: WASD/arrow keys
  • Aiming: Mouse
  • Shoot: L-click
  • Dash: Space
  • Bomb: E

Made in 1 week for My First Game Jam: Winter 2022
All non-UI visuals done by me
Music part of Total Music Collection by Muz Station Productions.
UI elements part of Pixel GUI Pack: Survival by Taduesz
Sound effects from Interface and Item Sounds by Cafofo and Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia
